name: Music_5294.wav
keywords: ['steel pan music', 'happy mood', 'caribbean feel', 'no voices', 'programmed percussion', 'bass', 'instrumental']
caption: This song features the main melody played on a steel pan. This is accompanied by programmed percussion with the hi-hat being played on the 'and' count of every bar. A bass plays the root notes of the chords in the background. Another percussion instrument plays a beat that sounds like a trotting horse. This song has a happy mood. This song can be played in a movie where a family is going on a holiday at a Caribbean island.
